item.description:
Interested in working on fostering the new economy based on the permaculture principles of Earth Care, People Care and Fair Share?  Consider getting involved in the ongoing Alternative Economics Forum.  

Here are the details about the next session.

--------------------------------------

Focus: Asset Mapping

The Alternative Economics Forum has been working to develop a network of people, organizations, businesses, and initiatives built around the concepts of cooperative enterprise, sustainability, food and housing security, permaculture, resilience, and participative decision-making. Please see the attached agenda for more details about this third meeting's focus on asset mapping, as well as background about the group's work so far.  

RSVP by replying below or emailing ali.mann@gmail.com and feel free to invite a friend or two that you feel would be a valuable addition to this work group. Coffee and light food will be provided.

See full agenda here

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Alternative Economics Forum: Mapping Our Assets
